5349.quoteText: We use cookies on our website for analytics purposes. Pages on our website include a small script that sends to us basic device information (like device screen resolution, country and duration of a visit).
5349.title: This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

tosdr.tldr: As stated in the Privacy Policy, "We use cookies on our website for analytics purposes. Pages on our website include a small script that sends to us basic device information (like device screen resolution, country and duration of a visit)."

5350.quoteText:
What information does iStudiez Team collect?

We collect the following information from you:
5350.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy provides details about the information the iStudiez Team collect.

5351.quoteText:
Your information can be collected by iStudiez Team only if you:

  • Use iStudiez Pro Cloud Sync service;
  • Contact us;
  • Send us your iStudiez Pro data backup (for support purposes).
5351.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

tosdr.case: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy provides details about the conditions in which iStudiez will collect your information.

5352.quoteText: <li>We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information and/or your iStudiez Pro data to any third parties
5352.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: Your personal data is not sold

5353.quoteText: <li>We may disclose the minimum of your information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential
5353.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

tosdr.case: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

5354.quoteText: We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our corporate policies, or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety.
5354.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

5355.quoteText: How does iStudiez Team respond to legal requests for my information?
5355.title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve your data.

5356.quoteText: We vigilantly protect the privacy of your account. We will not disclose your information to law enforcement or other governmental authorities unless we believe it is required to comply with warrants, court orders, subpoenas, or other lawful government requests. In rare cases, we may share your information as necessary to investigate or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, or as otherwise necessary to comply with our legal obligations.
5356.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

tosdr.case: Third parties are not allowed to access your personal information without a legal basis
tosdr.tldr: As stated in the Privacy Policy, "We will not disclose your information to law enforcement or other governmental authorities unless we believe it is required to comply with warrants, court orders, subpoenas, or other lawful government requests. In rare cases, we may share your information as necessary to investigate or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, or as otherwise necessary to comply with our legal obligations."

5357.quoteText: The data from your iStudiez Pro Cloud Sync account is stored on our servers. It is accessible to you until you make the decision to delete it.
5357.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service

5358.quoteText: We may delete your Cloud Sync account including all your iStudiez Pro data stored on our servers if you do not log into it for more than six months. If that happens, we will try to notify you before taking any action.
5358.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

5359.quoteText: This Privacy Policy is subject to revision from time to time on a going-forward basis.
5359.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

tosdr.case: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

5360.quoteText:
If we decide to change our Privacy Policy, we will post those changes on this page.

By using Cloud Sync service or contacting us (by email, social media or any other way) you consent to our Privacy Policy.
5360.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

5361.quoteText:
iStudiez Pro has 4+ age rating on the Stores, where it is present. It means, that there are no age limitations if you donâ€™t use iStudiez Pro Cloud Sync service or contact us (where your contact details are required).

To create iStudiez Pro Cloud Sync account you must be at least 13 years old.
5361.title: iStudiez Pro Cloud Sync accounts are only available to users that are at least 13 years old

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

5362.quoteText:
<li>We do not own or pretend for the ownership of your information.
Everything you put in iStudiez Pro is yours.
By using iStudiez Pro Cloud Sync service, you give us the permission to do certain things with your data so that we can run our service.
5362.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your content

5363.quoteText:
We get an access to your personal information only when you create iStudiez Pro Cloud Sync account or contact us.
Otherwise, your personal information or the data you enter into iStudiez Pro is not collected by iStudiez Team.
5363.title: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website and use most of the app's functions without revealing any personal information

tosdr.case: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
tosdr.tldr: As stated in the Privacy Policy, the iStudiez team gets "an access to your personal information only when you create iStudiez Pro Cloud Sync account or contact us. Otherwise, your personal information or the data you enter into iStudiez Pro is not collected by iStudiez Team."
